amendment.description: Amendment requires the consideration of impacts to public health prior to repealing any federal rules under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 348 - 75 (Roll no. 105).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 348 - 75 (Roll no. 105).
